name: Compound Microscope (microscope micrométrique)
maker: Micrometric stage invented by Michel-Ferdinand d'Albert d'Ailly, sixth duke of Chaulnes, Gilt-bronze mounts attributed to Jacques Caffieri

Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
